page.title: 05INTERVIEW WITH RESIDENT
page.content: In an interview with a retired teacher from Dane Valley High School we asked some questions about her life in Congleton.We found that she likes living on Congleton Edge because it is peaceful and isolated from town bustle .Congleton provides all her needs and she seldom travels far.She feels that there have been some significant changes: the small shops have been replaced by supermarkets;The main street has been pedestrianized;The construction of a town by-pass has been completed.She told us that Congleton Edge used to have small holdings where the owners used to work down the mines and tend cattle in their spare time.It has now been re-developed as housing for the wealthy.Only recently has water and electricity been suplied to the houses ,previously wells were used.
